If successful, Katie Price would join Louis Walsh , Dannii Minogue and Cheryl Cole on the show and Simon Cowell 's ex-girlfriend and show mentor Sinitta thinks she will be a great choice. Comment on this Article She said: Having Katie Price on the panel would make interesting viewing, so I can definitely see it working. She can do anything she puts her mind to. She's got the personality that would fit the role perfectly. Simon Cowell really likes her as well. There's no denying they get along. However, Katie Price - who recently split from second husband Alex Reid- faces competition from Robbie Williams as the Take That star is also being lined up to replace Simon Cowell .

been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star. "Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up," Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Except in the last quarter. I guess they felt like they had to do something. By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games

After a drawn-out recruitment by the Memphis Grizzlies, Allen Iverson finally confirmed Wednesday morning that he is indeed ready to sign with them, announcing via his Twitter feed: God Chose Memphis as the place that I will continue my career. Referring to a Monday meeting with Grizzlies owner Michael Heisley , general manager Chris Bosh Rasheed Wallace and head coach Lionel Hollins , Allen Iverson added: "I feel that they are committed to developing a winner and I know that I can help

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
